thread.title: Wenger must be ‘clinical’ and drop this Arsenal star against Bayern Munich - Cascarino
thread.title_full: Wenger must be ‘clinical’ and drop this Arsenal star against Bayern Munich - Cascarino

title: Wenger must be ‘clinical’ and drop this Arsenal star against Bayern Munich - Cascarino
text:
Arsenal FC via Getty Images 1 of 6 Click to reveal the best snaps of Mesut Ozil in Arsenal training GETTY Mesut Ozil's form has nosedived dramatically this term GETTY Arsene Wenger has been urged to drop Mesut Ozil against Bayern Munich 
“He must be clinical and this means there is no room for Mesut [Ozil]. 
“Bayern are a great side but they have some older players, particularly in defence and midfield and Arsenal must be energetic in their pressing and also break at pace. My XI would give them a chance to do that. 
“Danny Welbeck as a central striker can cause Mats Hummels problems — he has technical ability, great energy and pace and can finish one-on-one chances. 
“That would push Alexis Sánchez out wide but he and Theo Walcott are perfect players to press and then create and score chances on the counterattack.” 
Arsenal have stumbled at the last-16 stages for the past six seasons on the spin. Related articles
